name: Harvest Space
description:
Harvest Space

You are on space station and oxygen is limited. 

Space station is collapsing and you need to make a sacrifice to the goddess of fertlity to save your life

It accepts only plants as offering

But plants makes oxygen and you have limited supply of it

Harvesting stops oxygen regeneration 

Make the biggest offering and become the chosen one and be saved by the greate one

P.S. It is a multiplayer game and you will be join by other players. 

Your goal is to find plants and bring them to the statue. 

On top of the screen there is an oxygen bar, when it is over you will die. 

Rooms with not harvested plants has oxygen regeneration, when you harvest it the regeneration stops
